00071 enum AkPluginType
00072 {
00073     AkPluginTypeNone            = 0,    
00074     AkPluginTypeCodec           = 1,    
00075     AkPluginTypeSource          = 2,    
00076     AkPluginTypeEffect          = 3,    
00077     AkPluginTypeMotionDevice    = 4,    
00078     AkPluginTypeMotionSource    = 5,    
00079     AkPluginTypeMixer           = 6,    
00080     AkPluginTypeSink            = 7,    
00081     AkPluginTypeMask            = 0xf   
00082 };
00083 
00089 struct AkPluginInfo
00090 {
00091     AkPluginType eType;            
00092     bool         bIsInPlace;       
00093     bool         bIsAsynchronous;  
00094 };

01030 #if defined AK_WII

01032     static AkForceInline AkInt16 AK_FLOAT_TO_SAMPLETYPE(AkReal32 in_fIn)
01033     {
01034         AkInt32 i32 = (AkInt32)(in_fIn * 0x7FFF);
01035         i32 -= ((i32<=32767)-1)&(i32-32767);
01036         i32 -= ((i32>=-32768)-1)&(i32+32768);
01037         AkInt16 i16 = (AkInt16)i32;
01038         return i16;
01039     }
01040 
01042     static AkForceInline AkInt16 AK_FLOAT_TO_SAMPLETYPE_NOCLIP(AkReal32 in_fIn)
01043     {
01044         return (AkInt16)(in_fIn * 0x7FFF);
01045     }
01046 
01048     static AkForceInline AkReal32 AK_SAMPLETYPE_TO_FLOAT(AkInt16 in_iIn)
01049     {
01050         return (((AkReal32)in_iIn) * (1.f/0x7FFF));
01051     }
01052 #else
01053 
01054     #define AK_FLOAT_TO_SAMPLETYPE( __in__ ) (__in__)
01055 
01056     #define AK_FLOAT_TO_SAMPLETYPE_NOCLIP( __in__ ) (__in__)
01057 
01058     #define AK_SAMPLETYPE_TO_FLOAT( __in__ ) (__in__)
01059 #endif
01060 
01061     #define AK_DBTOLIN( __db__ ) (powf(10.f,(__db__) * 0.05f))
01062 }
01063
